database.postgres

Class InsertSchemaPostgres

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.postgres.InsertSchemaPostgres

  • public class InsertSchemaPostgres
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all methods required to store the results of the schema conversion from Neo4j to Postgres.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • executeSchemaChange

        public static void executeSchemaChange(java.lang.String database)
        Executing the various schema parts one by one to Postgres.
        Parameters:
        database - Name of the Postgres database to store the new schema on.

      • addFieldsToMetaFile

        private static void addFieldsToMetaFile()
        All of the fields and relationships gathered during the schema conversion are stored in meta files (to be used when outputting the results of the queries from both Postgres and Neo4j).

      • insertEachLabel

        private static java.lang.String insertEachLabel()
        If there is a label which is applied to a node only ever on its own in isolation, then store this as a relation to remove unnecessary NULLs which slow execution of SQL down.
        Returns:
        SQL to execute.

      • insertEachRelType

        private static java.lang.String insertEachRelType()
        Create each relationship table in the relational schema. The tables in the relational schema that correspond to each edge type of Neo4j will be prefixed with the two-letter pair of 'e$'.
        Returns:
        SQL string for insertion of each relationship type.

      • insertDataForLabels

        private static java.lang.StringBuilder insertDataForLabels(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                                           java.lang.String label,
                                                           com.google.gson.JsonObject o)
        For each 'label' relation, insert the appropriate values.
        Parameters:
        sb - Original SQL that will be appended to.
        label - Name of relation.
        o - JSON object containing data to store.
        Returns:
        New SQL statement with correct INSERT INTO statement.

      • insertNodes

        private static java.lang.String insertNodes()
        Insert all nodes into relational database.
        Returns:
        SQL to execute.

        Data/properties of the nodes to store.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Insert properties of the relationships to SQL.
        Parameters:
        sb - Original SQL to append data to.
        Returns:
        New SQL with data inserted into it.
